apiDescription: An iterator that iterates two other iterators simultaneously.
This struct is created by the zip method on Iterator. See its documentation for more.

trait implementations.name: impl<A, B> std::iter::Iterator for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::iter::Iterator, B: std::iter::Iterator

impl<A, B> std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator + std::iter::ExactSizeIterator, B: std::iter::DoubleEndedIterator + std::iter::ExactSizeIterator
impl<A, B> std::clone::Clone for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::clone::Clone, B: std::clone::Clone
impl<A, B> std::iter::TrustedLen for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::iter::TrustedLen, B: std::iter::TrustedLen
impl<A, B> std::fmt::Debug for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::fmt::Debug, B: std::fmt::Debug
impl<A, B> std::iter::ExactSizeIterator for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::iter::ExactSizeIterator, B: std::iter::ExactSizeIterator
impl<A, B> std::iter::FusedIterator for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::iter::FusedIterator, B: std::iter::FusedIterator

impl<A, B> std::marker::Sync for std::iter::Zip<A, B> where A: std::marker::Sync, B: std::marker::Sync
